cards.name: The Fool
cards.uprightMeaning: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit
cards.reversedMeaning: Recklessness, taken advantage of, inconsideration

cards.name: The Magician
cards.reversedMeaning: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.uprightMeaning: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, subconscious mind
cards.reversedMeaning: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal

cards.name: The Empress
cards.reversedMeaning: Creative block, dependence on others

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.reversedMeaning: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.uprightMeaning: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition
cards.reversedMeaning: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.uprightMeaning: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices
cards.reversedMeaning: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.reversedMeaning: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction

cards.name: Strength
cards.reversedMeaning: Inner strength, self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.uprightMeaning: Soul searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance
cards.reversedMeaning: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.uprightMeaning: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, turning point
cards.reversedMeaning: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles

cards.name: Justice
cards.uprightMeaning: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
cards.reversedMeaning: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.uprightMeaning: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives
cards.reversedMeaning: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision

cards.name: Death
cards.reversedMeaning: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging

cards.name: Temperance
cards.reversedMeaning: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment

cards.name: The Devil
cards.uprightMeaning: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality
cards.reversedMeaning: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment

cards.name: The Tower
cards.uprightMeaning: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
cards.reversedMeaning: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster

cards.name: The Star
cards.reversedMeaning: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection

cards.name: The Moon
cards.reversedMeaning: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion

cards.name: The Sun
cards.reversedMeaning: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic

cards.name: Judgement
cards.reversedMeaning: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call

cards.name: The World
cards.reversedMeaning: Seeking personal closure, short-cuts, delays
